entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:13 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 10:37 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
